item.description:
Let's try a new place this time around to have some of fun with the pups! We will take advantage of the cool air and take our doggies out for a spin!

Cost: Free, however donations are accepted to help maintain the cost of this meetup group

Directions to Turkey Hill entrance:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Regulations / Advisories:
Dogs must be under voice control or kept on a leash at all times.
Mountain biking is permitted only on designated trails.

Property Info: Ten miles of trails include the Milliken Memorial Path, planted with flowering shrubs in the late 1920s by Arthur N. Milliken as a memorial to his wife, Mabel Minott Milliken. Several glacial erratics dot the landscape, including a grouping called Ode's Den, named after Theodore "Ode" Pritchard, who lived under one of the boulders after losing his home in 1830. Bigelow Boulder honors the author of the first volume of The Narrative History of Cohasset.

Directions: Exit 15 From Rte 3 to Rte 228
Follow Rte 228:
Turn LEFT onto MAIN ST/MA-228. Turn RIGHT onto MAIN ST/MA-228.
Continue to follow MA-228.
SLIGHT RIGHT onto LEAVITT ST.
Turn SLIGHT LEFT onto TURKEY HILL LN.

http://www.thetrustee...
item.how_to_find_us: at the Turkey Hill entrance with my australian shepherd

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Saturday Morning Pack Walk
